description: The _heal_instance_info cache() is used to heal the cache access instance['info_cache'] so we should always load the info_cache so we can avoid the extra query to get it when accessed.
title: _heal_instance_info_cache should info info_cache as an expected_attrs

comments.content: The _heal_instance_info cache() is used to heal the cache access instance['info_cache'] so we should always load the info_cache so we can avoid the extra query to get it when accessed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~arosen

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/88458
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~openstack-gerrit

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/88458
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=5aa29b6b0a34d603e882a80cdc8e936f983b1892
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 5aa29b6b0a34d603e882a80cdc8e936f983b1892
Author: Aaron Rosen <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Apr 17 15:44:59 2014 -0700

    Remove unnecessary call to fetch info_cache
    
    The _heal_instance_info cache() always accesses instance['info_cache']
    therefore we should always load the info_cache so we can avoid the extra
    query to fetch it.
    
    Change-Id: I3c2e005b98abf2a80276562cc05e88ba5ff199bc
    Closes-bug: #1309239
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~openstack-gerrit
